FuncDef: The display ip routing-table verbose command displays detailed information about active and inactive routes in the IPv4 routing table. The display ip routing-table verbose command displays detailed information about active and inactive routes in the IPv4 routing table.
CLIs: display ip routing-table [ table-namemsr ] [ time-range <min-age> <max-age> ] verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a table of a producer.
-

Indicates a multicast static routing table.
-

Displays routes that are generated within a specified period.
-

Specifies the start generation time.
The value is a character string in the format of XXdXXhXXmXXs.

Specifies the end generation time.
The value is a character string in the format of XXdXXhXXmXXs.

Displays detailed information about active and inactive routes.
-
